metadata.title: CVE-2018-12066 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: BIRD Internet Routing Daemon before 1.6.4 allows local users to cause adenial of service (stack consumption and daemon crash) via BGP maskexpressions in birdc.

criterions.comment: bird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
